name: Sanctus
description:
Sanctus is a visual novel that follows that tale of two deities in love as they struggle against those who would wish to separate them. One banished from the heavens and cursed to live through multiple miserable reincarnations and the other cursed to suffer great pain if touched by the sun. 

Follow their journey as the push against the orders of Heaven to be together again.

----------------------------------------------------------

TRIGGER WARNING

This game makes reference to suicide and physical abuse as well as 
brief images of slight gore.

----------------------------------------------------------

How to play

Click to progress the text, choose options and progress the story.

Sanctus Team:
  • Matthew Askew: Environment Artist
  • Ravisha Nandlall: Designer, co-writer
  • Rushil Daya: Programmer
  • Stephanie Toerien/辛翡霓 : writer, sound designer, environment artist, co-programmer
  • Taliah Naidoo: Character artist
  • Tashalia Nair: Project manager, artist
Sanctus is the submission for the final third year game design students at the University of Witwatersrand
